page.title: 07INDUSTRY
page.content: APART FROM HOUSES THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF FACTORIES AND DEPOTS IN OUR BLOCK.A LOT OF THE FACTORIES ARE OWNED BY FIRMS WHO MAKE PARTS FOR CARS INCLUDING TYRES. DUNLOP IS THE BIGGEST FIRM IN THE AREA AND THEY HAVE A RESEARCH HERE FOR RUBBER PRODUCTS. THERE ARE ALSO A FEW INDUSTRIAL PARKS WHERE THERE ARE LOTS OF SMALL FACTORIES AND WAREHOUSES. MOST OF THE FACTORIES ARE IN THE BOTTOM HALF OF THE IN PYPE HAYES AND CASTLE VALE. SOME OF THE GOODS THE FACTORIES MAKE ARE SENT TOR FACTORIES IN THE MIDLANDS TO BE PUT IS,OTHERS GET SENTD THE COUNTRY AND QUITE A LOT GETSTO OTHER COUNTRIES.
